case.state: Hi, I'm May! Are you ready for a challenge?
What is that thing?!
There are other trainers here? This place must get some real attention then.
Other trainers... here? That must be a weird coincidence.
There doesn't need to be guys here for us to have fun, Misty. We'll have just as much fun as we had exploring the world together.
Why are you worried about there being no guys here, Misty. I'm sure we can just as much fun without them.
Oh yeah, we'll just see about that now won't we, Roxie?
Hey, once this is over, how about you join me on a contest and we work out a cool routine, Lux. Can you do something like a rainbow?
Demacia? Never heard of that place, Lux. What's it like? Do you think I could visit you sometime?
I love the moonlight. It's like a natural spotlight. And all the lights around us create an atmosphere like I've never seen before. This is going to be great!
I'm excited to play with you all today. Let's do this!
Whoa! I'll keep it!
May I have ~cards.text~ cards?
I'll take ~cards~.
~Cards.text~ new cards, please.
I guess I'll take ~cards.text~ new cards.
Alright! Finally!
These are nice.
Oh, how very nice.
This game sure is full of surprises!
Phew, I'm safe this round.
I'm glad I'm safe for this round.
Well at least I'm safe this round...
I'm at least safe for one more round...
Pretty good stuff. I'm sure to not lose this time.
Looks like I'll be safe this round.
Yeah! This is what I was hoping for.
These cards are alright. Barely.
This is a decent hand. You can't blame a girl for hoping for better.
I either stay in a little longer or I lose. We'll see what happens.
I may be on the verge of losing this battle, but we'll see what happens this round.
Like a normal battle match up.
This can keep me in the competition.
I can do it. I managed to come this far, didn't I?
All I can do is put my best effort in. And here it is.
My luck can be all over the place... but mostly it's good luck.
I may be down, but I'm not out just yet. Hopefully this can make me stay in just a little longer.
Not bad, but I'd want a better matchup at this stage of the game.
I'm so glad I'm okay. For now, at least.
These cards could be better...
Is this some kind of trick? I'm on to you, prankster.
This is... concerning.
Not good...
... Crap.
Oh that's just great.
*gasp*
This is terrible!
This is a disaster!
This hand isn't very effective.
These cards are like an impassable sandstorm. Hopefully I'll get through this okay.
Crud. These weren't what I was hoping for.
The most important recent event for me was when my father became the Professor of the Hoenn region. It set me on the path to become the trainer I am today,
I didn't even know about those rumors. I guess that would make sense though, since you're always traveling.
Yes, Professor Birch is my father. Have you two met before?
You would be correct that Professor Birch is my father, Cynthia. Have you two met before?
No! That's not what I meant at all. I was trying to say that would be the type of thing someone would make up to discredit your business trips!
You sure can dance! I could watch you for hours!
I can't say I have that many scars, at least not physically. There have been times, when it was rough, but my friends were always there for me.
This place looks expensive. How much does it cost to get a good meal here?
You know, this place looks pretty much the same as Illumina City. Does it also have a gym in the, what was it called? Eiffel Tower?
I could spend hours looking at the scenery. How the lights and the moon align, it just looks so beautiful.
Wow, what a giant cathedral the're having here. The only thing, that I've seen, which is comparable, is the dome in Hearthome City and that one is way smaller than this here.
I'm definetly gonna take some days off after this and explore the city. There just seems so much to look at.
This place sets such a romantic atmosphere with all those rose petals lying around. You really chose a great place ~name~.
Even though it's the middle of the night, it's at least not that cold. Otherwise this game would become at least a bit harder.
This is what I like so much about exploring. You end up in a beatiful city with a beautiful scenery and your having a lot of fun playing games with new friends you meet there.

The river in the back makes this place really relaxing for me, as I grew up in a region with a lot of water around me. Too bad it's the middle of the night, or I would ask you all if you wanted to take a swim with me.
I sure would love to have dinner up on such a romantic scenery. I mean, when the surroundings look so astonishing, then the food has to be delicious, right?
Now I'm ready, and I'm going to beat you!
Is it lunchtime yet?
This place is beautiful! I've never seen anywhere like it!
So, do you all live around here?
Can someone pass me my bag? All my snacks are in there.
They can be pretty common here, Meia. If you know where to look, you can find many different types of them!
Bracelet, time to say goodbye!
Bye-bye, shorts.
Let's start with my bag. Simple.
Sneaks it is, then.
Time to let my hair out.
Is it really time to show my tummy?

*heavy breathing*
You can do this, May
Be strong.
Oh no... I guess this is it, huh?
I'll go ahead and take off my bag.
Sneaks it is, then.
Ugh. Time to ditch the bandana.
Oh man... I wasn't prepared for this...
I was trying to avoid this, but if it is what I must do to win then I'll do it.
I can feel my heart beating out of my chest...
I guess I'll take off my bag. Phooey.
Again? I'll take off my sneaks.
This was the most I thought I'd take off going into this... Not good.
Is it too late to call it quits?
Ah man! I'm the first one to expose myself like this? This game is not going in my favor at all!
D-do I really have to show it all?
Digimon? I've never heard of those. I might have to ask some of my friends if they have heard about them.
So long, bag!
I hope my feet don't smell today.
I'm gonna be barefoot for a while, if that's okay with everyone.
The good thing about a bandana is no hat head!
When in doubt, wear two pairs of shorts!
Don't stare at me... Please...
Get an eyeful while you can, because hopefully this is all you're going to get to see!
Mnnnnnhhhh... I'm not wearing any panties under these shorts...
Um, congratulations!
Admit it, though. This looked pretty cute on me.
Why do I have to be the first one who has to flash you all? Can you please stop looking at me? Pretty please?
Dealer, hit me.
Phew, good thing I showered first.
People always tell me I have cute feet. But they're not anything special, really.
Let's just keep playing...
Case in point, Brendan.
Stretchy pants are the best, and they feel great too!
Are you happy now?
Sometimes I workout like this. But usually only where there are no boys around.
There. My tits are out on display. You're welcome.
I'm pretty sure I only want to show these to one person at a time. You know, like a normal person.
Can I play standing in the corner?
In my birthday suit already... and it's not even my birthday...
~Name~, I swear I won't peek.
I'm... I'm not going to look, ~name~. Promise.
Okay, ~name~, pick a piece of clothing.
Alright, ~name~. Looks like you have to take something off now.
Looks like you lost, ~name~. Now, what'll you take off?
Are you ready, ~name~? This one's all yours.
Take it away, ~name~.
And this round goes to... ~name~!
I'm not used to facing more than one opponent at a time, but I guess that's half the fun here, right?
Oh, ~name~ lost? At least it wasn't me.
Another round someone else loses means I have that much more of a chance of winning this game.
At least it wasn't me who lost this round. Now what will ~name~ take off?
Yes! I didn't lose. My chances of winning are at least a little bit better now.
I can at least keep myself in this a little longer since ~name~ lost.
~Name~ lost? It does keep me in the game that much longer which is good.
Show us what you have, ~name~.
Don't be afraid to show off a little bit, ~name~.
Looks like ~name~ lost. Make this a little interesting at least.
You've been playing better then I did, ~name~.
I guess you had to remove that ~clothing~ sometime. Doesn't make it any less boring though.
How is it possible that you still have accessories to take off when I'm standing here topless?
~Name~ must be cheating, look at how much he's winning by!
Yes, get that tie off. If you want to look stiff, there are other ways to do that if you know what I mean! Haha!
I sure am glad that you don't have a bag hanging off the front of your belt. I know a guy who does that, and it just looks hillarious.
I sure hope you don't miss anything important without your glasses...
Yes, get that tie off. You don't want to look too stiff, do you?
Let's see what the next round brings.
Well I hope we've seen the last of ~clothing.ifPlural(those things|that thing)~!
Cut that out! Don't you know how rude you're being?!
Just hold it right there! Don't you know how to treat a lady?!
That has to be cheating.
Well, you did have nothing, but I didn't have anything either, so I think it's okay if you just take off something little.
How is it possible that you still have accessories to take off when I'm standing here topless?
~Name~ must be cheating! Look at how much she's winning by!
Who cares? Let's just get on with it already!
I know it'll take more than this to win, but I think I can handle it.
Don't hog all the heavy lifting now.
Maybe this isn't the most exciting part of the game, but it's quick.
That's it. But don't give up, and I won't either!
Let's deal the next hand while she takes that off.
Thanks for the diversion!
It wouldn't be a real competition if we didn't each take a hit now and then. I'm sure it'll be my turn next.
No need to be uptight, Misty. You need to let your hair down every now and then.
Honestly, you look better with your hair down like that.
Yes, one of my main passions is finding out as much as I can about Pokemon. Sometimes, I have to use many different instruments to collect data on a single one.
Wouldn't it have made more sense to start taking this off?
Why don't you think about getting a bag attached to your belt? It's practical and looks good.
I'm not a huge fan of glasses. I think they would make me look too nerdy.
I collect ribbons as the trophies of my victories. So I'll take that one off your hands, ~name~.
Well, at least I didn't have to take anything off.
Let me know if you want any fashion tips later. I'd be happy to help.
We girls just can't accessorize enough, can we?
And that's fair, even if some people tell you it isn't.
Okay, I liked how that went. Can we do that about five or six more times?
I know a good ~clothing.ifPlural(pair of|)~ ~clothing~ when I see one. You could see a lot of the world on ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
I can't wait to tell my friends back in Petalburg City how ~name~ took off her ~clothing~. Wow. What an amazing story.
Hmm... what are you going to take off, ~name~?
~Name~ is treating this like a style battle. I like it.
I like your jacket. Not that it'd fit me that well. Hehe...
Cool! I'm glad we're all together right now.
You don't think that's going to be enough to make us happy, do you?
So, ~name~, which piece is coming off next?
Oh my, how did you get those scars? Were you attacked by a Scyther?
At least it's not my jacket that hitting the floor. Not that I'd be wearing one...
Well, jackets aren't really my thing, so I usually don't wear one.
What do you think ~name~, would that jacket look good on me?
Can you tell me where you got that jacket from? I have never seen one like that before.
Too bad you had to take your jacket off, you looked good in it.
Your jacked might be gone, but you still look awesome underneath!
Hopefully you won't forget your jacket when we're done.
I hope you don't feel too cold without your jacked.
At least it's not that cold here, so not wearing your jacked shouldn't be a problem.
You don't mind me borrowing that jacket later, do you? It looks kind nice.
I'm liking the way this is going!

*breathing heavily*
It's time, ~name~...
Yes, come join me!
To the victor go the spoils, right?
Much better...
Are you ready to bare some skin, ~name~?
Yes, come join me!
Why are there even more scars? Are you sure you're fine?
Well your skirt wasn't covering that much anyways. It's a bit weird to think that you're going to school with such a short skirt. What's your school's uniform policy?
Care to join me by going a little further?
Time to take your ~clothing~ off, ~name~?
I always get excited about seeing a guy's chest. Maybe too much.

*gulps*
You look nice...
Do you think love at first sight is a real thing?
I'm not looking! I'm... I'm... Screw it, I'm looking!
Finally, some inspiration!
Are they all usually this small?
Poor little thing. It doesn't have much oomph.
Well that's a bit of a bummer, but it'll have to do.
Wow... You're really excited, huh ~name~?
Okay, that's the ticket!
Lookin' pretty good down there, ~name~.
Wow. That's really big, ~name~. Surely it must be bigger then most.
Surely that must be on the bigger side of how big they get. It somehow makes me feel warm inside though...

*gulp*
Ready to show us your breasts, ~name~?
I'm curious to see what you have under there...
I kind of wish mine were closer to that size.
Those are really cute, perfect for grabbing!
Wow, that bra really accentuated your assets!
Hey, we're not so different, are we, Lux? I told you we'd make a great team!
If you're still a schoolgirl, is it really okay to do that in front of others? Doesn't your school have rules?
Don't be so shy. They're not that different from mine and luckily you got no scars on them, so they're as beatiful as mine, right, ~name~?
Wow, those kind of look exactly like mine.
Wow, your nipples are pointed right at me...
Your Honour, I plead guilty for being envious of those big boobs you have.
I wonder if mine will ever end up becoming that big... I feel so conflicted.
Mmmm, and I thought I was busty!
Wait, isn't that something like public exposure? Can you really do this?
(I'm going to just take a small look at the sexy attorney, for some references for some fantasies...)
Let's see what the sexy attorney looks like down there.
... Take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off, ~name~.
This is already making me wet!
Yes, bare it all for us!
Well, well. Looks like you didn't get away with it after all.
I wouldn't be that confident about doing something like that. You must be pretty brave, Twilight.
Oh my goodness, Twilight. You must be pretty brave if you can no something like that and not be worried about it.
I never really went to school, so I don't know what they taught you, but shouldn't you have time to take more care down there?
You should consider yourself lucky, ~player~, because a lot of people would love to see a cute schoolgirl get naked in front of them.
You look so beautiful, Lux. Why don't you take care of yourself down there, too?
Wow, even though you're super busy, you still have time to shave. That's impressive!
Wow, being an attorney sure seems time-consuming, considering your, ehm... looks.
(I should shave... It would make my adventures feel a lot more comfortable.)
You shave, ~name~? That's something I should do... It would make my adventures more comfortable.
(I should shave more often... It can be so uncomfortable during my adventures.)
You don't shave either, ~name~? I really should shave more... It sometimes feels uncomfortable during my adventures.
You trim, ~name~? That is a good way to keep it tidy while still having some hair.
You trim, ~name~? Trimming is a good way to keep things tidy...
Why would you start like this?! Please cover yourself up with something.
So pretty...
So pretty. I can tell you're as excited as I am!
Just like snowflakes, no two pussies are alike.
Hold up! When we lose we have to do that? In front of you all? Oh my, why did I take part in this...
Come on, you gotta give it your all, even if all the odds are against you!
Don't let your head down. Focus on the next hand, make the best out of it and it will get better. Trust me.
Well it's not like you're loosing that much. I mean look around. You still wearing the most clothes.
First things first!
Well, at least I'm not the only one playing without any clothes.
Oh my, at least it's not me who has to show off the goods...
So, time to... touch yourself, ~name~.
Come and join me, ~name~
Never too late to join the party, ~name~.
Mmm...
Interesting technique.
Go, ~name~ go!
Wow... the way it's bobbing up and down, it's almost hypnotizing...
Just concentrate on me, ~name~.
Almost there, ~name~!
I guess once you get used to it, it is kind cute...
Eek! I think some of it got on me!
Whoa, ~name~, watch out for my lady parts with that "Gunk Shot"!
That made me want to go for forfeit number two!
Oh my, are you really going to do that, Lux? I sure hope I don't have to... I want to win after all.
Yeah, come on and join me. Let's give them a show, Lux!
Time to show off, Lux! Let's see if you can beat my performance.
Well it looks like Miss Works-a-Lot joins in on the fun.
Objection! You're not taking the spotlight here. I'm the beautiful contestor and performer.
Too bad there's no loophole in the law to get you out of this one, am I right?
Since you're going to do it, that means this is not something illegal like indecent exposure, right?
Well it's time to show what you've learned in sex ed, right? Hehehe....
Whait, are we really going to let a schoolgirl go that far in front of us?! I mean, yes she is naked and all, but still...
So... you're going to show us how you touch yourself?
Reminds you of a teenage sleepover, right ~name~?
You'll end up like me soon enough, ~name~!
Why am I so turned on? This hasn't happened before...
Nice, you're really going at it!
What in the world are you doing?
Let's show those people what PokÃ©mon trainer can do!
Hehe, us trainers sure are the best, right ~name~?
I thought I was the only one who did it like that...
Wait, you can use your fingers to do that?!
I can't believe you're doing it in front of us!
If I lose another round, then I'll also be... Ugh, focus, May!
Try curling your toes. That always works for me!
Hehe, quite a show, but I hope you liked mine more, ~name~...
Now look who's taking the main spot to show off, hehe.
Hey, I might just use that technique myself in the future. You don't mind, right?
I can hear the wetness from here...
Oh my, to use your fingers like that, maybe I copy that move...
Oh ~name~, they can't decide who to watch, ehehe...
~Name~, you've barely been going a minute and you're already soaking...
Impressive show, Lux. Could it be, that you're also a natural performer like myself?
Wow, that was beautiful, Lux. If this was a competition, you'd get a solid ten out of ten from me.
Wow, for such a stiff lady, these were quite some moves!
I heard stories about college students financing their studies with such indecent activities. After seeing this, I wonder if that's why you're so good.
Please tell me you usually don't do this kinda stuff in your line of work.
Oh my! I thought only boys could do... that.
Want to borrow my shorts to wipe up the floor, ~name~? Well too bad!
I'd offer you my shorts, but I've already put them out of commission.
W-what?! This can't be, I... I demand a do-over!

*sigh*
I guess it's time for me to take the stage.
I hoped that I wouldn't need to do this, but I guess I can't win every battle I face.
My nipples are never usually this sensitive...
I don't do this often, but when I do it does feel pretty good.
These feelings are rushing through my body like a roaring waterfall...
Hah... this feels pretty good.
It's been a while, you need to let some steam off every once in a while. Like steam in a pressure cooker.
Maybe I should get around to this more often...
I don't like losing, but doing this is pretty satisfying.
You get quite comfortable while doing this...
It weird to think about this but it does feel good.
I didn't think I'd be doing this today... but it feels good.
...Hah
Oh man... It's been quite a while since I've done this.
Hah... so dirty, but so satisfying.
(Maybe I should do this more often. Except at home... alone.)
(Should I do this more often? It feels great...)
(Oh... I must be getting close now. It's like a waterfall down there.)
(I'm close. With every stroke it's getting harder and harder to control myself.)
Hah.. this feels great.
NYAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!
Wow, going all the way in front of you was the most exciting thing I've ever done.
Thanks again for telling me about this place, Misty. You were right: it is cool and interesting here.
Hey, don't get distracted by me. Hehehe...
After all, it was fun doing it in front of all.
Hmmm, I wonder who will win this game? But then again, I guess we're all winners in some kind of manner.
Even though it was fun, I sure wouldn't have minded winning...
Hey, does anyone know if they have something to eat here? I'd be down for some cooking if that helps.
They do have showers here right? Because I definetly need one after this.
Oh man, looking at you still going makes me want to join back in.
I might think about coming here more often. After all, it's kinda fun.
You sure get closer to people when you do all that together, hihihi...
I won! I didn't even have to expose myself.
I won! That was a lot of fun, we should totally try this again.
I hope you all enjoyed playing with me today.
I may of had to show off a bit, but at least I still won.
I won... but at what cost. My dignity has been shattered...
I did win... but that game was much closer then I would have liked.
Awesome! Way to go, Misty!
Way to go, ~name~! I wonder what happens next?
